Detailed Description

The Mat2 class extends the Mat class with a fixed 2x2 dimension.

See also:
Mat
Mat3
Mat4
Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Mat2::Mat2 (  ) [inline]

Default constructor.

Sets dimension to 2 to and initialises arrays to hold 0 values.
